0871A46B.Toast: The mysterious Edgar suggested I find him in Gea Kul.

09DCA900.Callback64Header: Ask about Suna in Gea Kul

3E0A0D3D.Phase71Description: Edgar wants my help to rescue Suna from the Knights Penitent. I must present myself as an informant to keep them distracted.

44ADC39F.Phase46Description: Edgar was supposed to meet Suna, but she never arrived. I should ask around Gea Kul to see if anyone knows anything.

D03F579C.Phase52Description: Suna was taken by the Knights Penitent. I must let Edgar know immediately.

E410A465.Phase88Description: Edgar has extended an offer to meet him in Gea Kul.

EF4FD180.Phase83Description: Edgar wants my help to rescue Suna from the Knights Penitent.
